plugins.name: blazor-skill
plugins.description: Comprehensive Blazor knowledge base for building functional, visually distinctive pages, components, and applications

plugins.name: observability-skill
plugins.description: Comprehensive .NET observability knowledge base covering Serilog, Seq, Elastic APM, OpenTelemetry, and instrumentation best practices

plugins.name: elasticsearch-skill
plugins.description: Comprehensive Elasticsearch and Kibana knowledge base for querying, indexing, .NET client integration, dashboard management, log pipelines, and observability

plugins.name: agent-sdk-skill
plugins.description: Comprehensive knowledge base for building Claude-powered AI agents in .NET using the Anthropic C# SDK, covering tool use, agentic loops, streaming, extended thinking, and architecture patterns
